author: Vincent Wood, Vincent Wood
title: Coronavirus: Bolsonaro fires Brazilian health minister who called for social distancing to contain outbreak
description: Brazilian president has downplayed threat of deadly virus
content:
Brazilian president Jair Bolsonaro has fired his health minister after a public feud over the nations coronavirus response.
The right-wing populist has repeatedly downplayed the threat of the virus in favour of supporting the economy - referring to the deadl… [+4779 chars]
